text: How much Car SA earns per month? Whats the basic salary and how much commission they get per car?

i saw Tan chong SA pay slip once,Basic 900some month got 2k, 4k, 5k, 8k, up to 11k...some month makan basic 900 only...

A former friend of mine was who was with Mercedes said that he could earn around RM700-900/car that is sold (C200).Higher percentage of bigger cars

If u sell a ghost, u get 12K commission. But normally your client is your boss's friend, so you only take 2k for helping to administrate the sell. The commission is for the boss coz he / she recommend it..
But how many Rolls Royce can a SA sell in a yr ?

avatar_title: Keep Calm , You Only Live Once
text: low basic , high commission  ... 1 car average 1k++ not included trade in car (songlap few k), runner fees, No Plate , Tinted those.
Go sell private jet, sell 1 jet get 6 figure commission

heard from a brokerthey rather sell cheap cars than expensive cars, coz margin not much difference, easier to get people buy cheap cars. some more cars like merc kena layan datuks datuks. those rich customers, kadang kadang midnight say want test driveback to topic, basic as mentioned above, it's 900. kereta margin roughly 1k-2k (commission from one car about 500-1k?) + some places bagi handling fee extra 600 + discount (biasanya x bagitau customer, like RM500 discount + 5 years free service, they usually just promo free service), then makan the discount rm500this for cheap car, for cars like merc: basic tinggi, margin no big difference, they make money from trade in, mark up some parts
1xxx k per car for local car...one month 10 car ..not include basic..consider good oh

I know some lousy datuks memang like that, he memang want to buy that car liau. But die die organize party at house then midnight call the salesman bring the car over to test drive just to show off to his friends. Kecian the salesman but at least he bought a S-Class from him la
Correct, orang atas are much tougher to deal with.

Thats why u see P2 SA dont care much selling bezza, they target selling others especially MYVI.
